title: Pita Pit
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain restaurant with locations throughout the U.S. Has whole wheat pita bread and vegan choices. Vegan toppings like avocado and artichoke hearts are included for no extra charge. Vegan choices are falafel, hummus, babaganouj, garden pitas and a variety of sauces. Free Wi-Fi. Within walking distance to BYU.
